resources.string: The city is filled with dust and it\'s your job to clean it all up! Use the arrow keys to move around the city and pick up the dust pieces along the way. Watch out for the asthma triggers though. The pet, mold, cockroach, and cigarette will chase you all around the board. You start with two inhalers and one nebulizer. Every time you get hit by a trigger, you need to take a puff. After two inhaler puffs, if you get hit, it\'s time to use the nebulizer. One more hit after you use your nebulizer means a game over so be careful! See if you can beat your high score! Good luck!!!
You have been hit! Now, you need to take a puff from your inhaler.
You have been hit by a cat! Keep your pet out of your bedroom! Now, you need to take a puff from your inhaler.
You have been hit by mold! Be sure to check your leaking pipes! Now, you need to take a puff from your inhaler.
You have been hit by a cockroach! Get a cockroach trap and ask them to check into the roach motel! Now, you need to take a puff from your inhaler.
You have been hit by smoke! Don\'t let people smoke around you! Now, you need to take a puff from your inhaler.
You have been hit by smoke! Don\'t let people smoke in your car! Now, you need to take a puff from your inhaler.
You have been hit by smoke! Don\'t let people smoke in your house! Now, you need to take a puff from your inhaler.
You have been hit! Because you have used your inhaler twice, it\'s time for the nebulizer.
Take your daily medicine so you can go enjoy your day!
Now that you have taken your daily medicine you can begin the game!
Click on a character to begin!
